verses.verse: 'Now this<WH2088> is the law<WH8451> of the guilt<WH817> offering;<WH817> it is most<WH6944> holy.<WH6944>

'In the place<WH4725> where<WH834> they slay<WH7819> the burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> they are to slay<WH7819> the guilt<WH817> offering,<WH817> and he shall sprinkle<WH2236> its blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>
'Then he shall offer<WH7126> from it all<WH3605> its fat:<WH2459> the fat<WH451> tail<WH451> and the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the entrails,<WH7130>

and the two<WH8147> kidneys<WH3629> with the fat<WH2459> that is on them, which<WH834> is on the loins,<WH3689> and the lobe<WH3508> on the liver<WH3516> he shall remove<WH5493> with the kidneys.<WH3629>
'And the priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6999> them up in smoke<WH6999> on the altar<WH4196> as an offering<WH801> by fire<WH801> to the Lord;<WH3068> it is a guilt<WH817> offering.<WH817>
'Every<WH3605> male<WH2145> among the priests<WH3548> may eat<WH398> of it. It shall be eaten<WH398> in a holy<WH6918> place;<WH4725> it is most<WH6944> holy.<WH6944>

'The guilt<WH817> offering<WH817> is like the sin<WH9128> offering,<WH9128> there is one<WH259> law<WH8451> for them; the priest<WH3548> who<WH834> makes<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> with it shall have<WH1961> it.

'Also the priest<WH3548> who presents<WH7126> any<WH376> man's burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH5930> that priest<WH3548> shall have<WH1961> for himself the skin<WH5785> of the burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> which<WH834> he has presented.<WH7126>

'Likewise, every<WH3605> grain offering<WH4503> that is baked<WH644> in the oven,<WH8574> and everything<WH3605> prepared<WH6213> in a pan<WH4802> or on a griddle,<WH4227> shall belong<WH1961> to the priest<WH3548> who presents<WH7126> it.
'And every<WH3605> grain offering<WH4503> mixed<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> or dry,<WH9164> shall belong<WH1961> to all<WH3605> the sons<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> to all<WH376> alike.<WH251>
'Now this<WH2088> is the law<WH8451> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> which<WH834> shall be presented<WH7126> to the Lord.<WH3068>

'If<WH518> he offers<WH7126> it by way<WH5921> of thanksgiving,<WH8426> then along<WH5921> with the sacrifice<WH2077> of thanksgiving<WH8426> he shall offer<WH7126> unleavened<WH4682> cakes<WH2471> mixed<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> and unleavened<WH4682> wafers<WH7550> spread<WH4886> with oil,<WH8081> and cakes<WH2471> [of well] stirred<WH7246> fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil.<WH8081>
'With the sacrifice<WH2077> of his peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> for thanksgiving,<WH8426> he shall present<WH7126> his offering<WH7133> with cakes<WH2471> of leavened<WH2557> bread.<WH3899>

'And of this he shall present<WH7126> one<WH259> of every<WH3605> offering<WH7133> as a contribution<WH8641> to the Lord;<WH3068> it shall belong<WH1961> to the priest<WH3548> who sprinkles<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> of the peace<WH8002> offerings.<WH8002>

'Now [as for] the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of his thanksgiving<WH8426> peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> it shall be eaten<WH398> on the day<WH3117> of his offering;<WH7133> he shall not leave<WH5117> any<WH4480> of it over until<WH5704> morning.<WH1242>

'But if<WH518> the sacrifice<WH2077> of his offering<WH7133> is a votive<WH5088> or<WH176> a freewill<WH5071> offering,<WH5071> it shall be eaten<WH398> on the day<WH3117> that he offers<WH7126> his sacrifice;<WH2077> and on the next<WH4283> day<WH4283> what is left<WH3498> of it may be eaten;<WH398>
but what is left<WH3498> over<WH3498> from the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> shall be burned<WH8313> with fire.<WH784>

'So if<WH518> any<WH4480> of the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of his peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> should [ever] be eaten<WH398> on the third<WH7992> day,<WH3117> he who offers<WH7126> it shall not be accepted,<WH7521> [and] it shall not be reckoned<WH2803> to his [benefit.] It shall be an offensive<WH6292> thing,<WH6292> and the person<WH5315> who eats<WH398> of it shall bear<WH5375> his [own] iniquity.<WH5771>

'Also the flesh<WH1320> that touches<WH5060> anything<WH3605> unclean<WH2931> shall not be eaten;<WH398> it shall be burned<WH8313> with fire.<WH784> As for [other] flesh,<WH1320> anyone<WH3605> who is clean<WH2889> may eat<WH398> [such] flesh.<WH1320>

'But the person<WH5315> who<WH834> eats<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> which<WH834> belong to the Lord,<WH3068> in his uncleanness,<WH2932> that person<WH5315> shall be cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from his people.<WH9415>

'And when<WH3588> anyone<WH5315> touches<WH5060> anything<WH3605> unclean,<WH2931> whether human<WH120> uncleanness,<WH2932> or<WH176> an unclean<WH2931> animal,<WH929> or<WH176> any<WH3605> unclean<WH2931> detestable<WH8263> thing,<WH8263> and eats<WH398> of the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> which<WH834> belong to the Lord,<WH3068> that person<WH5315> shall be cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from his people.<WH9415>' "
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Speak<WH1696> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> 'You shall not eat<WH398> any<WH3605> fat<WH2459> [from] an ox,<WH7794> a sheep,<WH3775> or a goat.<WH5795>

'Also the fat<WH2459> of [an animal<WH2966>] which dies,<WH5038> and the fat<WH2459> of an animal torn<WH2966> [by beasts], may be put<WH6213> to any<WH3605> other use,<WH4399> but you must certainly<WH398> not eat<WH398> it.

'For whoever<WH3605> eats<WH398> the fat<WH2459> of the animal<WH929> from which<WH834> an offering<WH801> by fire<WH801> is offered<WH7126> to the Lord,<WH3068> even the person<WH5315> who eats<WH398> shall be cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from his people.<WH9415>
'And you are not to eat<WH398> any<WH3605> blood,<WH1818> either of bird<WH5775> or animal,<WH929> in any<WH3605> of your dwellings.<WH4186>
'Any<WH3605> person<WH5315> who<WH834> eats<WH398> any<WH3605> blood,<WH1818> even that person<WH5315> shall be cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from his people.<WH9415>' "
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> 'He who offers<WH7126> the sacrifice<WH2077> of his peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> to the Lord<WH3068> shall bring<WH935> his offering<WH7133> to the Lord<WH3068> from the sacrifice<WH2077> of his peace<WH8002> offerings.<WH8002>

'His own hands<WH3027> are to bring<WH935> offerings<WH801> by fire<WH801> to the Lord.<WH3068> He shall bring<WH935> the fat<WH2459> with the breast,<WH2373> that the breast<WH2373> may be presented<WH5130> as a wave<WH8573> offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the Lord.<WH3068>
'And the priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6999> up the fat<WH2459> in smoke<WH6999> on the altar;<WH4196> but the breast<WH2373> shall belong<WH1961> to Aaron<WH175> and his sons.<WH1121>
'And you shall give<WH5414> the right<WH3225> thigh<WH7785> to the priest<WH3548> as a contribution<WH8641> from the sacrifices<WH2077> of your peace<WH8002> offerings.<WH8002>

'The one among<WH4480> the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> who offers<WH7126> the blood<WH1818> of the peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> and the fat,<WH2459> the right<WH3225> thigh<WH7785> shall be his as [his] portion.<WH4490>

'For I have taken<WH3947> the breast<WH2373> of the wave<WH8573> offering<WH8573> and the thigh<WH7785> of the contribution<WH8641> from the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from the sacrifices<WH2077> of their peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> and have given<WH5414> them to Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> and to his sons<WH1121> as [their] due<WH2706> forever<WH5769> from the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

'This<WH2088> is that which<WH4888> is consecrated<WH4888> to Aaron<WH175> and that which<WH4888> is consecrated<WH4888> to his sons<WH1121> from the offerings<WH801> by fire<WH801> to the Lord,<WH3068> in that day<WH3117> when he presented<WH7126> them to serve<WH3547> as priests<WH3547> to the Lord.<WH3068>

'These<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> to be given<WH5414> them from the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> in the day<WH3117> that He anointed<WH4886> them. It is [their] due<WH2708> forever<WH5769> throughout their generations.<WH1755>' "

This<WH2088> is the law<WH8451> of the burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH5930> the grain offering<WH4503> and the sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> and the guilt<WH817> offering<WH817> and the ordination<WH4394> offering<WH4394> and the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002>

which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> at Mount<WH2022> Sinai<WH5514> in the day<WH3117> that He commanded<WH6680> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to present<WH7126> their offerings<WH7133> to the Lord<WH3068> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai.<WH5514>
